name: Kāla
description:
You find yourself in a mining colony far below the surface of Planet Kāla, sentenced to an indefinite quarantine. Legends suggest that the spirit of this planet, Gaia Kāla helps those who prove their worth.

Kāla is an FPS-style exploration game made in UE5

Explore Synterra's mines on Kāla, there are people who can help you and tools you can use to navigate the landscape more effectively. Platforming and careful observation might be enough to help you escape this massive subterranean prison.
